title: The Anatomy of Us
description:
The stunning conclusion to THE ANATOMY OF JANE…
  It's simple really.  Jane prefers to never get romantically involved with either of the two men that could be the father of her child.  Wesley wants to open another successful restaurant and forget all about the ménage à trois he had with Maxwell and Jane.  Maxwell wants the three of them back together and will do anything to make it happen…even if means getting on his knees.  See…simple, right?  
Three lovers, one love story...
author: Amelia LeFay
